00034 int MakeMuonEvents::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData *aData, TSetupData* aSetup){
00035     if(fAlgorithm.empty()) return 1;
00036     TMEGeneratorOptions* opts=NULL;
00037     if(Debug()){
00038        opts = new TMEGeneratorOptions(fAlgorithm);
00039        opts->SetOption("debug","");
00040     }
00041     fGenerator=TMEGeneratorFactory::Instance()->createModule(fAlgorithm,opts);
00042     if(!fGenerator) return 2;
00043     return 0;
00044 }
00045 
00046 int MakeMuonEvents::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *aData, TSetupData* aSetup){
00047   gMuonEvents.clear();
00048   int retVal=fGenerator->ProcessPulses(gMuonEvents,gDetectorPulseMap);
00049   return retVal;
00050 }
